entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Matagami
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:18 PM EST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -35.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Matagami Airport 02:00 AM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023
Condition: Clear
Temperature: -35.8°C
Pressure: 102.3 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 71 %
Wind Chill: -45
Dewpoint: -39.2°C
Wind: SSE 8 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Clear. Low minus 32.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 32. Wind chill minus 23 this evening and minus 42 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 17.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 42 in the morning and minus 22 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 23.
